Articles.Content:
hello,

I find that working in local lan party is the top of that KSP has to offer.

I suggest the development of a mod or an integrated feature would be the ability to learn from what is being done: "Artemis Spaceship Bridge Simulator".

A full crew is required to perform all tasks of a mission, I think it's a really interesting aspect, isn't it?

Thanks a lot.
Well, there is always Telemachus. Which gives everything you need. So you can have a mission-control-esque feeling.
